ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.rendered

Class FormatRed

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.rendered.AbstractRed
      • ch.randelshofer.quaqua.ext.batik.ext.awt.image.rendered.FormatRed
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CachableRed, java.awt.image.RenderedImage

    public class FormatRed
extends AbstractRed
    This allows you to specify the ColorModel, Alpha premult and/or SampleModel to be used for output. If the input image lacks Alpha and alpha is included in output then it is filled with alpha=1. In all other cases bands are simply copied.
    Version:
    $Id: FormatRed.java 478363 2006-11-22 23:01:13Z dvholten $
    Author:
    Thomas DeWeese
